You need to find clues in the corners of the city. You have to look for clues in people's minds and memories.

name: CUBeKA
summary: CUBéKA is a new type of "pen and paper" word puzzle. Each CUBéKA puzzle has a single word as a solution.

name: Dragon Boar and Lady Rabbit
summary: help Lady rabbit to recover the carrots, through her I think Lady Rabbit will be able to find the carrots, you will have to recover them all.

name: Heimdall
summary:
Heimdall is an action-adventure computer game developed by a team called The 8th Day and published by Core Design.

The game is set in the world of Vikings and Norse mythology. Loki steals Odin's sword, Freyr's spear and Thor's hammer, rendering them powerless. They decide to create an infant, the title character (named after the god of the same name), who must bring back the three legendary weapons.

The game sees Heimdall and his crew travelling around an archipelago of islands in three different maps: Utgard, Midgard and Asgard. They travel engaging monsters in combat, interacting with the locals, solving puzzles and avoiding traps, a blend of styles somewhat similar to that found in the Legend of Zelda games. The cartoon-style action is viewed in the isometric perspective.

name: Demoniaca: Everlasting Night
summary: Demoniaca - is a dark, gothic, mature and sexy action RPG inspired by the Castlevania series. Explore, fight, meet new friends and avenge those who brought you unbearable pain and loss.

name: The Silver Case 2425: Deluxe Edition
summary:
The Silver Case 2425 Deluxe Edition includes:
- The Silver Case 2425 Game
- Official Soundtrack
- Soft Cover Artbook
- Collector's Box

name: Go to It
summary: Have you ever wanted to run your own software company? Go to IT is a business simulation game with a multitude of parameters to manage and meaningful choices to enjoy. Build your company and bring it to the top, surviving almost 30 years of software industry ups and downs.

name: DoodleVR
summary: Doodle VR is a Pictionary like VR game. A classic word guessing game where one person draws a picture in virtual reality and the teammates have to guess what is being drawn.

name: The Singularity Wish
summary: The Singularity Wish is a game about the choices we make. There are no puzzles or turn-based combat, instead the player is confronted with the consequences of their actions... or inaction.

name: Sonic CD
summary: Sonic CD (also known as Sonic CD 2011) is a remaster of the original games, adding many new features like widescreen support, improved controls, access to both American and Japanese soundtracks and Tails as an unlockable playable character.

name: Snufkin: Melody of Moominvalley
summary: Snufkin: Melody of Moominvalley is a musical adventure game in which Snufkin needs to restore the harmony of Moominvalley, after a series of grotesque parks has appeared and ruined the valley's natural balance. The game is an ambient and wholesome experience for both kids and adults, and combines open world-mechanics with puzzles, stealth and melodic elements.

name: Pacific Liberation Force
summary: Are you ready to take up arms against El Presidente and his forces of evil? Taking place in a fully destructible environment, complete 18 challenging, trigger happy and arcade-like missions! You'll be conducting aerial warfare versus a wide range of enemies, from simple footsoldiers to heavily armed tanks and from fighter jets to incredible carriers!

name: dsync
summary:
No time, no space, just you. Then the split. The divide. The dsync. One becomes two. 
Chaos ensues and 'the other' takes control. The one becomes the two becomes the multitude. A countless horde created for your destruction. 
 
You are lost. Yet you are all the same. 
 
You should be one. 
You MUST be one. 
 
dsync is a retro-style wire frame blast fest featuring multiple levels, super smooth 60fps, a pumping soundtrack and non-stop arcade action. It features extensive online Leaderboards and achievements. 
 
- Traverse 6 long levels with wave after wave of enemies hellbent on your demise 
- Lock on to multiple targets to achieve multiplier scores aplenty 
- Collect pickups to charge your Smart Bomb 
- Collect energy pickups to recharge your Shield 
- Tough End Level bosses 
- Comprehensive User Interface allowing Audio/Visual/Controller customisation 
- Enable the retro effect for CRT style madness! 
- Control with a mouse, keyboard or controller 
- Controller Vibration support

name: Roadwar 2000
summary: It is the year 2000 and the United States has fallen to a biological plague and a limited nuclear war turning surviving cities into strongholds held by what is left of society. With a team, you must roam these highways and discover a cure before it is too late.

name: Kayalina
summary: Kayalina is an interactive comics with 3D art. The story contains sexual content, nudity and violence

name: Voice of Vamana
summary: The year is 2130. A vessel from interstellar space - the first concrete proof that humanity is not alone in the universe - has entered our solar system and is hurtling towards the sun. As the only ship capable of reaching it in time, you are tasked with discovering it's purpose. Venture inside the allegedly lifeless thing and divine what you can.

name: Explorer of Yggdrasil
summary: After rescuing an armless mage during a chance encounter, the explorer Mei embarks on a journey to reach the top of Yggdrasil, and to uncover the mystery of her forgotten past.

name: Hoa
summary: Hoa is a platform-adventure game featuring beautiful hand-painted art and a calm, relaxing atmosphere. The game follows the main character, Hoa, as she discovers her own story on a journey through a breathtaking and magical world back to her homeland.

name: San Zoolin
summary: San Zoolin is a beautiful latin island full of mysteries and colorful characters. You get to explore the inner lives of these characters in depth, as well as the beautiful world around them as the new island therapist.

name: Life is Strange: True Colors - Deluxe Edition
summary:
Alex Chen must embrace her volatile psychic power of Empathy to uncover the truth about her brother's death.

The Life is Strange: True Colors Deluxe edition contains:
- Life is Strange: True Colors: the complete game.
- Exclusive Bonus Story: ‘Wavelengths’: play as Steph in the year before Alex came to Haven Springs, in a standalone story set in the iconic Rocky Mountain Record Traders store and KRCT radio station.
- Exclusive Life is Strange Hero Outfit Pack: change up Alex's look with 4 new outfits inspired by past protagonists. The pack includes clothing inspired by Chloe’s Misfit Skull, Sean’s Wolf Squad, Daniel’s Space Mission, and Max’s Jane Doe outfits, with one outfit available for Alex to wear in each chapter of the main game.

name: The Last Patient
summary: "Last patient" is a short first-person horror shooter with a frightening atmosphere.

name: Mr. Joshua Carrot
summary: Mr Joshua Carrot" является уникальным 2D платформером с головоломками и уникальными авторскими рисунками в стиле граффити.

name: Dungeons: The Dark Lord - Steam Special Edition
summary: Dungeons: The Dark Lord - Steam Special Edition contains three exclusive multiplayer-maps. The maps Dunst, Playfreight and Labda were specifically designed for the brand-new game mode Piñata and are ideal for fast and thrilling multiplayer battles.

name: Front Mission Evolved: Wanzer Pack 3
summary:
Smash the competition with a wanzer evolved from the Front Mission franchise's past (Wildgoat) and 1 brand-new type (ISV-Prototype). 
 
NOTE: There are numbering differences between the Japanese and English releases for the same content. Japanese stores released as "Wanzer Pack 2", while western stores released as "Wanzer Pack 3".

name: Laser Attraction
summary: Play with lasers and solve puzzles in Laser Attraction. Use reflection, refraction, dispersion and filtration to direct the laser beams, mix and separate colours, open doors, hit targets and complete puzzles.

name: Cosmic Pioneer
summary:
Navigate through space and successfully land your spacecraft without crashing. Cosmic Pioneer is heavily inspired by the classic Moon Lander game.  
Traverses the galaxy made of randomly generated levels filled with various hazards, keep track of your ships condition and aim for the highest score.

name: Theomachia
summary: Theomachia is a permadeath action game in which you take on increasingly difficult waves of enemies using psychokinetic abilities. The environment is your only weapon. Use it to fight off dangerous enemies - beings from another dimension sent to conquer yours.

name: Cornflakestein
summary: Hitler has returned! People opened a doorway to the world of Nazi flakes under the medieval castle on Mars and now people are in danger to be burnt in the concentration camp.

name: Sol Trigger
summary: Sol Trigger is the La Résistance to the Machine Church which rules the dystopian city of Kaiserhald. The Machine Church is using a miraculous energy source known as "Sol" to raise the city to even greater heights, but Sol Trigger know that Sol is secretly made from people, and that the Church intends to ramp up their production with a new form of twisted technology.
